data.name: Darkest Dungeon Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Original 'Darkest Dungeon' score by veteran composer Stuart Chatwood. This DLC contains 11 tracks at present and will contain 13 tracks when it releases in full version on January 19, 2016.

Stuart Chatwood previously composed music appearing on the soundtracks for eight Prince of Persia games developed by Ubisoft: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (2003), Warrior Within (2004), The Two Thrones (2005), Battles of Prince of Persia (2005), Revelations (2005), Rival Swords (2007), Prince of Persia (2008), and The Fallen King (2008). He also is well-known as the bass guitar and keyboard player for the Canadian rock band 'The Tea Party'. The Tea Party are known for fusing together musical styles of both the Eastern and Western worlds, in what they call "Moroccan roll".

He also is well-known as the bass guitar and keyboard player for the Canadian rock band 'The Tea Party'. data.short_description: Original 'Darkest Dungeon' score by veteran composer Stuart Chatwood, featuring 11 tracks! This DLC will continue to be updated as new tracks are added to the game throughout Early Access.
data.legal_notice: Music Copyright 2014-2015 Stuart Chatwood, licensed by Red Hook Studios Inc. Darkest Dungeon game and images Copyright 2015 Red Hook Studios Inc. "Darkest Dungeon" and the Darkest Dungeon logo is a trademark of Red Hook Studios Inc. All rights reserved.
